advice: Panic. (Just kidding. Stay cool.)
Send your last meme.
Yell dramatically into the void.
Quick, grab some snacks!
Practice your best action movie pose.
Text your mom. She knows what to do.
Charge all your devices. Even the weird ones.
Find your lucky socks.
Queue up your battle playlist.
Perfect time to finally clean that one drawer.
Write a heartfelt note to your pet.
Invent a new dance move. Name it after yourself.
Maybe alphabetize your spice rack?
Start building your pillow fort headquarters.
Time to rank your top 5 survival snacks.
No rush. Maybe take a power nap?
Teach your plants motivational speeches.
Finally read the terms and conditions.
You have time. Invent a board game.
Rewatch your favorite movie for strategic insights.
Knit yourself a battle scarf.
Get a head start on your memoir: 'The Day I Waited.'
Update your apocalypse wardrobe.
Design your new flag.
Plenty of time to master yo-yo tricks.
Record your will... in interpretive dance.
Sketch your dream underground lair.
Plan your ultimate heist... of cookies.
Form alliances with local squirrels.
Build a throne out of laundry baskets.
